findings.rationale: A five-year duration for confidentiality may not be sufficient for certain sensitive information, leading to potential exposure after the term ends.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing the Disclosing Party to seek injunctive relief without posting bond poses a financial risk to the Receiving Party, as it can lead to unjustified restraints.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: The inability to assign the agreement without consent may limit operational flexibility, especially during mergers or acquisitions.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
